name: Halloween 2016 NA Scare Cart
overview:
This is a scare cart published exclusively for distribution on NintendoAge. Only 24 were made. The sole intention of this game is to scare whoever is playing it. The "game" lasts only as long as it takes you to get to the scare screen, then a scary face pops up and screams.

The game itself is not very long, but it is longer than the Halloween 2015 Scare Cart.
